mapper.select: select AAA.FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT, AA.* from( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IDX DESC) RNUM, RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_NAME, RESERVE_CNAME, RESERVE_AREA, RESERVE_NUMBER, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_LOCATION, RESERVE_PRICE, RESERVE_CONFIRM from RESERVATION order by RESERVE_IDX DESC ) AA ) AAA where AAA.RNUM between #{START} and #{END}
